DLG SPR_1

{sequence
  - i look like a three, i know.
  - but at least i'm not rounded.
}
"""

{sequence
  - uh uh uh.
  - sorry that's all i can say.
}

{sequence
  - what wanna know happened to my sister, clocenunvo?

}

DLG SPR_d
i am most definitely not an alien!!!

DLG SPR_e
oh what, you thought just because the rest of these clowns are hopping about i will too? im too busy for that nonsense.

DLG SPR_f
miss close-mid back rounded THINKS she's busy... meanwhile i'm here holding triconsonantal languages together. it's a thankless job.

DLG SPR_g
some people will say i'm in japanese, but listen, i'm here to tell you thats fake news.

DLG SPR_h
come to scandinavia!!! we have lots of fucked up vowels!!!

DLG SPR_i
the OG queen is here! move aside bitches, because NONE of you can handle this open front unroundussy!

DLG SPR_j
open mid-front unrounded vowel, 32 years old, looking for a diphthong to join to make a triphthong ;)

DLG SPR_k
my older brother is SOOO embarrassing! i pretend we're not even related tbh.

DLG SPR_l
eyyy!!!! its me!!!!!! ignore the tumour!!!!!!!
